original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū dīghaṁ ālopaṁ karonti …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū dīgham ālopam karonti pe
parimaṇḍalam ālopam karissāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca dīghaṁ ālopaṁ karoti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca dīgham ālopam karoti āpatti dukkaṭassa
